name: Metaphysics
summary:
Colorful arcade offline action with pixel art.
Pixel Retro offline Roguelike Action
imagine yourself as a hero. What would you do?
Great retro game for fans of dynamic arcades
A colorful and nostalgic atmosphere game that combines genres of arcade, platforming and action at the same time. In Metaphysics, you will not find a twisted plot, non-linear gameplay or complex quests, all you need to do is to shoot out evil enemies who constantly attack you from different directions. Get ready to start a fierce battle for valuable bonuses and enjoy the classic gameplay, made in the style of the best old school games.
Fun for every day entertainment
Choose your favorite character and go to the location teeming with opponents and remember that each character is not only distinguished by his charismatic appearance, but also by some features that affect the gameplay. Destroy crowds of enemies with weapons and watch the attack timer! In Metaphysics, you will not have the opportunity to "shoot" without stopping, be tactful and correctly plan a battle with each of the opponents.
